    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.management
    Java interfaces and component interfaces used in the content nodes of the DHT in the DHT/MapReduce project.

      void      		 DHTManagementCI.merge(java.lang.String computationURI, LoadPolicyI loadPolicy, fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<CI> caller) 
      <CI extends ResultReceptionCI>
      void      		 DHTManagementI.merge(java.lang.String computationURI, LoadPolicyI loadPolicy, fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<CI> caller)
      make a pass over the DHT, merging adjacent nodes that total a number of stored entries under a threshold, and then sending a signal to the designated caller through the given end point when the pass has terminated.
      <CI extends ResultReceptionCI>
      void      		 DHTManagementCI.split(java.lang.String computationURI, LoadPolicyI loadPolicy, fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<CI> caller) 
      <CI extends ResultReceptionCI>
      void      		 DHTManagementI.split(java.lang.String computationURI, LoadPolicyI loadPolicy, fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<CI> caller)
      make a pass over the DHT, splitting nodes in two adjacent ones when the former has a number of stored entries over a threshold, and then sending a signal to the designated caller through the given end point when the pass has terminated.
